array.string: while true; do ppp="$(ifconfig 2>/dev/null | grep -o '^ppp[0-9]*' | head -1)"; if [ -n "$ppp" ]; then iface="$(route -n get 140.114.58.87 2>/dev/null | awk '/interface:/{print $2}')"; case "$iface" in ppp*) ;; *) route add -net 140.114.58.0/24 -interface "$ppp" 2>/dev/null ;; esac; fi; sleep 5; done
